website_summaries.verdict: The best kitchen trash can on the market right now. You'll be hard pressed to find a better constructed trash can - or one that is as easy and intuitive to use.
pros: comes with great foot pedal-opening system
inner system great at getting air out of trash bags
cons: Fairly pricey compared to units with similar features

customer_reviews.title: The Hefty bag brand with the blue tie strap work "Better" than the Glad brand with the black tie strap
customer_reviews.text: Although the product says 13 gallon trash bags. The normal ones don't fit as they are slightly too small. Not interested in buying their custom bags. The Hefty bag brand with the blue tie strap work "Better" than the Glad brand with the black tie strap. The company is obviously trying to push their custom bags sold through them. Not a customer friendly decision.
customer_reviews.author: ALOHA

customer_reviews.title: Best trashcan EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Best trashcan EVER. Stays clean, easy to change bags, super durable, and completely keeps the dogs out of the trash. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: USED GARBAGE CAN
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can came used. One picture is included that shows cooked peas smooshed at the bottom of the bag that it came packaged in. The box was undamaged and it was put into a sealed plastic bag. Before we even took it out of the bag we could see brown streaks, scratches and food particles all over it. Needless to say, we are returning it. Hopefully SImplehuman rectifies this problem and it doesn't happen to other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Irishgirl

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We just unboxed our new trash can and we're super excited about it. At first we were unsure about paying this much for a "trash can" but I'm glad we did. The thought process that went into designing this trash can really exceeds our expectations. Pro: Stylish. Flat back so it's flushed to the wall (space saver). Silent close lid. Lid lock switch to keep the lid open. 'Bucket park' makes it easy to change bags 10 year warranty Con: Not exactly 100% FINGERPRINT-PROOF. You have to push the the lid back with your hand to wedge the 'lock switch' under to stay open (not a big deal)
customer_reviews.author: Barron

customer_reviews.title: Best garbage can ever.  Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I waited about a year before I finally ordered; I thought it was too expensive for a garbage can. But I was wrong. This thing is great. It's so much better than my previous round bin: it holds much more; the lift mechanism is smooth and quiet; the bag stays securely in place, and the wide opening makes it easy to dump stuff in. The Simplehuman bags fit well (and I got a free sample box of 10), but my old Kirkland bags from Costco will also fit fine with a little encouragement. I can't believe it, but I actually love a garbage can!
customer_reviews.author: RAWphotos

customer_reviews.title: Great can for keeping dogs out!
customer_reviews.text: Love this can. It’s very large and I finally found something to keep my large dog out! I used regular large kitchen trash bags in it. I did like the sample bags they sent, but think they’re too expensive. I will probably buy a second can for recycling. It keeps the smells in the can.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ricks

customer_reviews.title: The Included promotional trash liners offer does not work.  Don't bother wasting time .
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it's a great trash can, well designed and works well so far. My gripe is that the company included an offer for a discount on liners if you register the product. It all works well until you enter all your information to order the liners with the discount code, credit card number, etc, but then the "Place Order" button does nothing no matter how many times you click. Super frustrating and disappointing. Hope Simple Human can get their website fixed so their customers don't feel like you just got duped into giving them all their information.
customer_reviews.author: MyPrime

customer_reviews.title: Good looking -- But open lid gets stuck on underside of counter top
customer_reviews.text: Nice design EXCEPT open lid tops out at 34.8 inches. What is the design team thinking? Standard counters are 36" from the floor, standard counter tops are 1.5" thick, and most every manufactured cabinet is therefore 34.5 tall. If anyone (like me) wants to put this can under the counter or under the counter top overhang, the lid will bang into the bottom of the standard counter top and possibly get stuck and refuse to close without manual intervention (or worse). Why cannot all the smart engineers at Simple Human come up with a can that reaches no higher than 34 3/8" when the lid is open? Nice looking, nice features, but think hard before you propose marriage.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: So Good!!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is my new favorite thing in my kitchen. I love it. Perfect size, very easy for my 3 year old to open by stepping on the pedal. Also love the liner and so easy to pull out to change the bag. My toddler does leave finger marks on the lid, so not entirely smudge proof, easy to clean though. Seriously, I LOVE this trash can and this brand. This is the second trash can we have bought from Simple Human. P.s. I read reviews before I bought this and quite a few people said reg kitchen bags would not fit. We have not had that issue. The kitchen bags I bought, for with no problem, and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Medlock

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I would fall in love with a trash can
customer_reviews.text: If this trash can was on Tinder, I would swipe right on this can! I love it and I love the bags that go with it (Q). I don't even mind paying extra for their bags, I like them so much. Much like Steve Martin in "The Jerk", if I could only take one thing with me it would be this can. I've already bequeathed it to my eldest child in my will.
customer_reviews.author: M. Petterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Design and Quality
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace our kitchen trash can and I am very pleased with this product. The foot control is very responsive and the lid has a soft close. Great quality, sleek design and packaged exceptionally well to protect from damage in shipping. The product comes with a supply of SimpleHuman trash bags that are sturdy, so we may order this brand in the future. There is a red button on the inside that keeps the lid up while you change the bag, putting less stress on the lid mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this guy but
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this guy but, the lid has a tiny separation when closed so we have been having fruit fly issues, which we have narrowed down to the trashcan. We recently updated to this from a full lid simplehuman that was boxier for the space. We take the trash out everynight and still we can't figure out how to get rid of them, they get in and out of the trashcan all day long
customer_reviews.author: Let's roll.

customer_reviews.title: Love My New SIMPLEHUMAN 50L Trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: It is possible to love a trashcan? Yes, if it's a SIMPLEHUMAN 50 liter. This thing is huge, sleek, shiny, modern, and adds a touch of elegance to any kitchen. I tried the SIMPLEHUMAN trash can liners and immediately ordered 60 more. They fit like a glove and you're able to get tons more garbage into the can the you would with the cheaper bulk bags from local outlets. I can go a week without changing bags. The trash can works flawlessly and closes with the grace of a ballerina. Buy one and you'll soon be loving it too.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Love it and sad I had to pay this much for quality trash can
customer_reviews.text: Well, never thought I would pay this much for a trash can, but I did. Size is great, lid is great, easy in and out on the trash can liner. Perfect!! No issues with the performance at all. Just me crying over the price. But I would recommend if you get that part time job.
customer_reviews.author: texasbbj

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed or flush; smells bad
customer_reviews.text: The lid on this is not even close to flush. I can see the gap and push it down with my hand. Worse than that, I can smell it. I have to take out the garbage half way through being full just to get rid of the smell. And since the lid is made of strong metal, even a 32 oz liquid container set on top doesn't push it all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Snake Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Believe positive reviews, excellent and stylish trash bin
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen and the trash bin is difficult to tuck out of sight. The Simplehuman 38 liter trash bin is the perfect size and design for my small (manhattan sized) kitchen. And finally... my dog can't get into the trash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: simplehuman 50 liter
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for a Christmas gift for our daughter whose husband is currently an invalid. They needed a larger waste basket. The item arrived on time and they are using it but she reluctantly told me that when they opened it it has several large dents in the side of the basket so therefore I am very disappointed in this purchase. I am glad it arrived on time. They are using it as is but I feel bad because they received a gift that was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flinsy
customer_reviews.text: I received a garbage can that was dented. While the box was not in great shape, the box damage did not justify the dent in the can. The can was replaced promptly. But, I don't want it anymore. The siding is flimsy. Why would anyone want an expensive garbage can that has flimsy siding that dents so easily? I have not opened the second box to look because I am waiting for Amazon to get over themselves and start excepting returns again.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago and forgot to put a review. This trash can has held up well. Easy to clean, has not broken. Works great for keeping the dogs out of the trash. The bags for it are not the standard ones but are available in a variety of stores and online (including amazon and bed, bath, and beyond). You might think it is expensive, but it is worth the extra money to not have to replace a cheap plastic one every few months to a year. Plus, it looks far better than the plastic ones and is easy to clean. Update: Over a year later and still going strong. No issues. Still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size well made
customer_reviews.text: This can is large enough to fill a tall kitchen trash bag completely. Our old can had room left, but this stretches very tightly across the top and does not come off until you take trash out. They want you to buy their trash bags, and they do fit perfectly, but we have found that we can use regular tall kitchen bags, stretch them tight, and they work great, too. Bottom pedal is sturdy and opens whisper quiet. I really like the 10 year warranty, that drew me to this one. Firs well in our pantry.. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: It feels kind of insane to pay this much for a trash can, but once you've lived with a crappy one for a while, and then go to this, you feel like it's money well spent. Truly does resist finger prints, nice slow-close lid, huge capacity for a kitchen can, keeps odors in can and not kitchen. I do love the custom bags that came w/ it, but not enough to shell out for them. Standard drawstring tall kitchen bags work fine- just need to be stretched a bit to get them over edges of inner bin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE TRASHCAN PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: Totally different trashcan arrived. It’s round, and an automatic motion trashcan which scares my child half to death. Husband didn’t know it was the wrong trashcan and he set it up while I was at work (removed all the decals, threw away the shipping box) or I’d return this thing. I wanted the rectangular pedal trashcan in this picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not even small dog proof
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand how other reviews say their big dogs can't into it as my 16 lb poodle mix knocked it over, tore the entire bag out, and scratched the entire side of this can on the first day. I must have a smarter dog. This is not advertised as a pet-proof can, but I expected the butterfly lid wouldn't open wide when tipped over like the Simplehuman rounded can did.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Harned

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We just bought this to replace a slightly smaller SimpleHuman can that we’d had for 12 years. We loved that can for the concealed hinge, quiet self close feature, slim design, and can-within-a can design. That one survived a 1200 mile move and operated flawlessly until a hinge gave way and broke. With that longevity, we didn’t even look at other brands of a trash can for the replacement. We’re looking forward to many years with this one. This one has a metal hinge and metal step so it’s definitely a step up in quality and should last another decade or more. Tip for first time SimpleHuman buyers...use their bags. An ill-fitting grocery store brand bag detracts from holding capacity.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDiva

customer_reviews.title: Dog Nose proof.
customer_reviews.text: I have a good feeling my 2 wont be able to open this one with their noses like my previous step trash can. Hallelujah!!!! Every 10 min was the trash can lid noise, now I'm so happy that they cant do that. It is a quiet close (goes back together slowly) and is a good size trash can!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin  S

customer_reviews.title: great trashcan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trash can as I was hoping to find something low profile, durable, and something that might help keep garbage smells at bay. This trashcan ticks all boxes. The butterfly lid makes it easy to open the trashcan with little pressure on the foot pedal and definitely keeps the garbage smells at bay. We purchased the medium size butterfly lid just to make sure we aren't keeping trash around the kitchen for too long and the size is perfect. I do enjoy the simplehuman bags that come with the trashcan but they are way expensive and I've found the 13 gal costco trash bags fit well enough that I'm not pressed to purchase the branded bags.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Miz

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. Doesn't fit 13 gallon bags.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking trash can and it closes very quietly, which are both nice. But because of the ongoing nearly daily annoyance of having to use more expensive or certain brand names of bags, or trying to stretch a normal 13 gal bag into the opening, I would NEVER have bought this trash can. The price was a bit over the top, but for something you use every day, I was willing to splurge on the one time price. I'm not happy with the expensive solutions needed every day for the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Holly

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Tried to find something cheaper, but we definitely wanted a step to open can and the plastic ones don't look as nice and they move when we step on the peddle...so we spent the money for the simplehuman. It fits nicely in our space and works well, just as described, and amazingly really doesn't leave finger marks. I usually hate stainless steel because it required constant cleaning, but this really doesn't. Now if it lasts ten years it will totally be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: One of the most perfect waste baskets I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the most perfect waste baskets I have ever used. It is like having an art object in the kitchen. It blocks out smells, uses a nice size plastic bag - not too big, not too small, and I really like the way it opens and closes so silently. It is slender and elegant and if it could walk, could be great on a runway during New York Fashion Week, if it hasn't been already,.
customer_reviews.author: Porgy

customer_reviews.title: For a trash can, this is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a decent trash can that not only looks nice but can handle a lot of trash. This was it! Although it’s pricey, (I would never in my dreams spend this much for a trash can!), it’s awesome. And the soft close makes it nicer. It’s much bigger than I thought so if you have a small area, you might want to go a bit smaller. I just received it yesterday but hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: Generally a very nice garbage can for a narrow space
customer_reviews.text: Generally a very nice garbage can for a narrow space, which was what I needed. One note of caution though: The front corners of the 2 lids are sharp and one time when I was throwing something away without looking a gashed my hand pretty good. They probably should have some thin strip of rubber on the corners.
customer_reviews.author: David Galt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, functons great, great value too!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well-made, we've had a larger version of this can in our kitchen for years. Decided to get this smaller one to use as a recycling bin once our kitchen remodel was finished. Love the soft-close feature, and it's super easy to clean, meaning it will look goid and function well for many years to come. I balked at paying rhis much for a trash can, but this one has outlasted every single less expensive one I ever had to replace. That's what you get when you're purchasing a value product, rather than a cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Y. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase!! It's a thin-profile and sits nicely against the end of my counter (I don't have room under any counters to store a trash can). I absolutely love that you don't see the trash bag and liner container from the outside. This wasn't the cheapest model (but certainly not the most expensive, either), and I would highly recommend it. It's sturdy (and I have a toddler), easy to clean, and the lid has a soft-close feature - something I didn't realize when I initially purchased. It sounds absurd to love a trash can, but I LOVE THIS TRASH CAN!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, poor condition
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to stop my dog from getting into the trash. It’s great design and would have worked. I ultimately returned the item but not because of design . This arrived in such poor condition and the lid was dented in such a way that my dog would have gotten into it, which defeats the purpose. There is a plastic locking aspect to the lid but that’s to hold it open. All in all it looked nice, but far too expensive for a damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE NO COMPLAINTS.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE EXACT SIZE I NEEDED. LOVE THE FACT I CAN LOCK IT OPEN UNTIL I FINISH PREPARING THE MEAL. THE RECOMMENDED BAGS ARE A LITTLE PRICEY BUT THE SAME SIZE IN THE SUPERMARKET ( NOT STORE BRAND) WORK JUST AS WELL. I HAVE NO PROBLEM WITH THE GARBAGE BAG SHOWING OR PETS PICKING IN THE GARBAGE. THERE IS NO WAY THEY CAN GET THE GARBAGE CAN OPEN. UH OH A SPILL, NO PROBLEM. I DAMPEN A PAPER TOWEL AND WIPE IT CLEAN. I READ SOME NEGATIVE REVIEWS FROM OTHER READERS AND DECIDED WHAT I ALREADY KNEW WAS RIGHT. THERE IS ALWAYS SOMEONE SOMEWHERE THAT WILL COMPLAIN ABOUT EVERYTHING. I AM HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Chema

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I cringed when I bought this back in March 2017, 'cause it's $100...for a garbage can. But I needed one that is easy to clean, easy to open for a disabled member of our family, and durable enough for a household with a young boy. It did come with a sample pack of same brand garbage bags that fit very well. Though I never bought more of them. Wasn't worth the extra $$ when I could just use a stretchy Hefty bag and a "garbage-top" rubberband. It's been well over a year since I bought this and it still looks nice, still works like it did from day 1. LOVE IT! Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this trash can actually makes my kitchen look better ! I decided to go with a rectangular bin to replace my old round tall bin, also Simple Human, that we had for 15 years. This rectangular bin can store so much more than the round one! Although I use the exact same Glad 13 gallons liners. I had to stretch it every time replacing the liner, but not impossible. It’s so quiet and looking sleek in the corner. I hope it will last me 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: Zunteress

customer_reviews.title: okay this is a great, fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Okay, okay this is a great, fabulous, dare I say trash can.....NO....garbage receptacle, maybe a little better but this stainless steel beauty with the butterfly lid is indeed a work of art....We recently remodeled different parts of the kitchen, you know all new appliances, counter tops, etc...all beautiful, but the first thing my husband shows everyone is the simplehuman stainless steel receptacle....go figure...This also has a life time warranty...just what do you have to lose,,,,,beauty and use ability....buy one....it is worth every penny...
customer_reviews.author: SusanReaderDeluxe

customer_reviews.title: High quality product ...
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a larger garbage can for recycling in our newly updated kitchen. I purchased a competitive product that contained bins for garbage and recycling. However, it was not easy to install a plastic bag as the handles got in the way (and I knew my husband would never fight the 'bag battle' ... and that we'd have plastic sticking out of the top for years to come). I returned that product and purchased two Simple Human products. We're using the large container for recycling and a slightly smaller version for garbage. We've had Simple Human products for years and they work very well. I'd recommend this approach / product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurene McE

customer_reviews.title: Purchased because my dog is crazy and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can. Needed one because my dog knocked over the previous tall trash can and ate an entire rotisserie chicken carcass (crazy dog). He lived. And now we have a sturdy trash can he can’t knock over! Easy to clean - as far as smudge proof it isn’t “proof” but it’s “generally resistant”.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Products, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Have bought three of these cans so far, one for myself and two for others. This can is great because it is practically indestructible, hands-free, and the perfect shape for maximizing the amount of trash that can be placed in a standard 13-gallon kitchen trash bag. We push the contents down periodically with a plastic grocery bag, and our household of two has only one bag of general trash per week. (We do have a large recycling container, with free pickup, though.) The company stands behind its product warranties. When the (plastic) lid to our original can broke after a few years of use, they sent us a new stainless lid that has lasted ever since. Excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Austen Fan

customer_reviews.title: Classic Look
customer_reviews.text: Size, shape, and quality all awesome. The top is not stainless steel, and cleans up nice when something splatters on the lid. Shape works well to remove a full trash bag. The rectangle shape fits in well next to a wall that is the major walkway of the kitchen. Color is nice because it is classic stainless steel and black...compared to some of the rose gold, gold, and annoying patterns on the market right now. This can does what it says it will do without making it the focus of the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: PonchoLady

customer_reviews.title: We love this trash can!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, most importantly, you don't have to touch it to use it, except when changing the bag or if you need to use the lid hold open feature. It takes standard 13 gallon kitchen bags, so you don't have to use the SimpleHuman ones if you don't want to. It closes slowly and quietly, you can control how fast it opens by how hard you press on the foot piece. It is expensive as trash cans go, but it is also warranted for 10 years and very well made. My wife has Lupus, so I got it so she doesn't have to touch the lid anymore.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: A superb trash can that is dog proof!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is the best trash can out there. Bought it to stop our Great Pyrenees from getting the trash out and dragging it everywhere. There is absolutely no lip that he can get his nose under. In addition, this trash can is gorgeous! Really looks good, and functions very well. The lid is dampened on opening and closing, so it doesn't slap open. Still opens quickly, just without shaking everywhere. No ledges behind the lid either, so no trash collecting between the mechanisms that are impossible to dig out like other foot pedal cans. Just very well designed in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Bizness

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this trash can. It is easy to remove the liner to change the bags and clean it. I have noticed occasional fingerprints near the lid. They are easy to remove. The only thing I don't like about this trash can is regular trash bags won't fit tightly. We have to order our trash bags. But, to be honest, the trash can is so great, I don't mind having to order the bags. The bags from simplehuman are excellent quality. I hope to use this trash can for many years. I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Trash can: $100, Liners: $25, Joy: PRICELESS
customer_reviews.text: The question of the year, thanks to Marie Kondo, is "what sparks joy in your life?" I never expected the answer to be "my trash can," but it is. I was dubious spending so much money on a kitchen trash can, of all things. But this fits PERFECTLY next to my kitchen island, and the lid opens up fully under the counter overhang. It feels luxurious each time I use it, with the lid closing so gently. I don't know how it'll hold up but so far, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: jrandom

customer_reviews.title: Wow--Quiet--Now that I'm working from home that is a huge plus!!
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet.. Heck that makes it 5 stars. Our old can slamming was going to put me over the edge! I can't believe a put up with it for 9 years. Now.. WOW. I no longer jump from my chair!! It does use Costco 13 gal trash bags without issue.. so you're OK on that. Takes up less space as it fits snug to the end of the counter. "HE double hockey sticks" This is the one!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Bob Beach

customer_reviews.title: Love this garbage can!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a smaller version of this for my bathroom. It worked perfectly so bought the larger version for my kitchen. I have 4 dogs who love to get into the garbage...no longer though! These cans are spacious internally yet slim so take up little room. They are made of great materials so heavy (and unable to be easily tipped by a canine nose.) It was a big initial investment so saves me the endless cleanups I had for years before this.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Sears

customer_reviews.title: Good trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love almost everything about this trash can except for the smell. Our trash just stinks! Which should be pretty standard except that we compost so the only thing going into the trash is non-organic or non-recyclable waste. Every time we take the trash out I have to spray down the bin and leave it outside overnight to air out. Within a week it begins to stink again. Again, pretty normal for trash but I assumed it would be better at regulating smells since we don’t put anything particularly stinky in there.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Omg. This trash can is beautiful. It is so quiet when it closes and design is wonderful. Needed something slim for a narrow space and it fits perfectly. The capacity is large. I have a family of 5 and it took 6 days to fill rather than every other day. It conceals any smells, garbage started to smell toward the 5th day. The garbage fit snug around the insert and stays in place. You can use tall kitchen bags, they don’t Completely reach the bottom by an inch. The foot pedal does smudge but can does not. Very well made. Highly recommend for 4 + Person families.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Okay, fine, it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Swore I’d never spend this much on a trash can... SO GLAD I DID. I thought surely you cant improve the design of something like a trash can so much to make it worth this but clearly I know nothing! The lid is dog proof for us. Definitely smudges but I’ve never had anything that says “smudge-proof” that actually is so I don’t really mind that. You can use the Glad 13gal trash bags but it’s tight. I actually really love the trash bags that came with it - way better quality
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Functions very well, clean looking, and durable
customer_reviews.text: Best feature is the insert for the garbage bag. Very easy to remove and change the bag. Very nice looking can, easy to use, and easy to keep clean. Very tired of buying the cheap plastic garbage cans that would break over the years. A little pricey but well worth it. Buy the amazon 13-17 gallon bags (Q) that are cheaper that the simple human bags. You can use the regular 13 gallon bags but they will tight and hard to remove from the insert when filled with garbage. Very durable no issues with lid as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nimnyc76

customer_reviews.title: Life is easier with this trash can
customer_reviews.text: The design of this trash can is so sleek and perfect. I no longer struggle to take the garbage bag out or replace it. The lock feature helps with that. I don't use simplehuman bags. I use Hefty 13 gal tall kitchen bags in the 10 gal simplehuman can. Fits perfectly and I utilize the whole bag. It doesn't slam shut. It really is smudge proof. I ended up buying a smaller version of this can for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have been using this trash can for a couple of years, and I love it. It's easy to use and does not require the Simple Human trash bags. You can use a typical Glad bag and cinch it by pulling the excess through a hole at the top of the inner can. Warning: The edges of the trash can lid are pointy and can cut you. I have never cut myself, but my husband has a number of times.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: The best trash can brand
customer_reviews.text: This is the most affordable trash can in the simplehuman product lineup. it is sleek, sturdy, and the soft close is amazing. It comes with a 10 year warranty, so do your self a favor and shell out an additional $20 for a simplehuman vs other brands.
customer_reviews.author: TAmazon

customer_reviews.title: 30 L size works well with paper grocery bags
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd buy a $100 trash can, but, my better half wasn't pleased with the plastic one we had before. If it's as durable as the other reviews say, it'll have been worth it. We'll see... I've always used paper grocery bags for trash, and my primary search criteria was finding a stainless container that could fit them. Not a fan of plastic bags, and I really don't think I want to drink the "buy our custom fit liners" coolaid. After extensive searching, this looks like the best option. The removable liner is nice too - easy to transport to the main trash can when the kitchen can needs emptying, and easy to clean when needed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lueck

customer_reviews.title: Best Trash Can!
customer_reviews.text: After I purchased this product I couldn’t believe how many people I know also have the same brandname product, and they all rave about how good it is, and how much they love it. I have to agree, and it didn’t take long after receiving the product that we couldn’t agree more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: Functional, easy to clean, large capacity, aesthetically designed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trashcan to replace my battery touchless sensor opening trashcan that ceased working after to many lysol sprays. I'm done with batteries in my trashcan and happy to use my foot again to open the lid. It is a large trashcan with a wide mouth - it's actually a bit work to get my trash bags to stretch, but it works and I love the extra space. It's functional, easy to clean, and aesthetically pleasing. Not much more I can ask than that in a trashcan!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Classy garbage can
customer_reviews.text: So...just got this garbage can today. We live in a very small place, so hugging the wall is very important. So far I have not kicked or stumped my toe on it as it is literally in a hallway/doorway. I’m loving everything about this can so far. I put my own plastic bag Members Mark from the local bulk big box store in the plastic liner container. It was a bit tight which required a tiny bit of force, but they will fit. The lid is so quiet, and it matches really nice with all my other black and stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: RAC

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is narrow and taller than my old ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is narrow and taller than my old oval can, yet uses my same generic 13gallon bags. Love that it is practically a silent close, my old can went BANG when you would release the foot pedal. Love that it is easy to change the bags, very little stretching-effort when I use generic regular 13 gallons bags. Love that it locks open and has an inside notch to hold the interior can up while you replace the bag. Love the warranty and hope It lasts longer that my old one, which was 18 years of BANGING!
customer_reviews.author: Berner Fever

customer_reviews.title: Picture and dimensions are accurate. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order within 48 hours! Amazon originally estimated 5 to 7 days. Very impressive. The trashcan itself is exactly as described. I now have a silent lid again and I couldn’t be happier. In terms of being “fingerprint resistant”, that part is absolutely true. The one slightest gripe I have is that it doesn’t extend to the footpedal. If you like walking around barefoot and use the can, you will leave one perfect toe print. Otherwise, I highly recommend it, would give as a gift or purchase again. Probably unlikely due to 10 year warranty.) Very happy customer! - Daria D
customer_reviews.author: Daria D.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it more after I discovered I can tilt the ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it more after I discovered I can tilt the plastic insert to put on and take off the bin liner. I had also discovered how to keep the lid doors open which added to its usability. That little label on the inside door is worth reading. :) I purchased this type because there is an outlet on my kitchen island which would be unusable with any other type of trash can this size. I don't have to open this up all the way to put trash in. I opted for a slimline since space on that side of my island was at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: For What It's Worth...

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quality, too darn expensive
customer_reviews.text: Although I don’t have a love affair with this trash can like everyone else seems too, it really is nice. It’s very good quality and is super heavy. The lid lifts perfectly. Over my dead body will I buy custom can liners, so regular ones work great (unless I drink too much one night and get silly with a treat yo self to expensive trash bags moment.) I found myself vacuuming and wiping the interior of my trash can yesterday. What has my life come to?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful exterior cheaply made interior
customer_reviews.text: This simple human garbage can fits perfectly next to cupboard, looks nice and cleans easily. However my complaint is the inner plastic liner is very thin and flexible not sturdy fit this high quality and price of a garbage can. Also the lock is also cheap plastic and difficult to use. I’ve had previous garbage cans from this company and the inner black liners look nice they are also sturdy plastic. I’m concerned this will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Nosek

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent!!!!!!😄
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing trash can. It was an expensive one but well worth the money spent. The reviews I read said that it kept dogs out and it does. We have a very mischievous lab puppy who gets into everything. Abby doesn't get in this one! This trash can keeps the odors in too. Some people commented about the bags for this trash can and how bad they were. The trash bags that come with this trash can fit perfectly. They are worth every penny spent on them too. The bags are heavy duty and do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Ni10gal

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE MOTHER OF ALL TRASH CANS!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no words to describe this product. So amazingly functional and perfect in every way. Beautiful to looks at. Flawless pedal action. No slamming the lid against the wall. Smooth soft and noiseless closing. Absolutely perfect. Hands down the best trash can ever!!
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Simple Human excellent quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fit. Does not smudge and fits the OEM bags. Quiet operation and has a locking feature for the lid which is very convenient for changing the bag if you need the lid up when cleaning the room. 30 liters is about 8 gallons which is a convenient size for a kitchen for a couple or small family so food does not rot and sit in the can for too long (if the usual 13 gallon size may be too big. We also have a 8 gallon under the sink trash can so this can share the same bag size.
customer_reviews.author: DeanM

customer_reviews.title: Lid stopped working after two years
customer_reviews.text: i bought one of these about two years ago. It worked fine until the lid stopped closing. It just stays open now (no, I have not wedged it open). So I need to buy another trash can. I think, for $100, it should work for more than two years. I know there is a warranty. However, in order to use that you need to fill out the form (it should be automatic, not require you to post it in) and I would need to ship the item back to them. The expense and time and inconvenience of that really isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: charliegg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a trash can that my dog couldn't break. She is a Pitbull and it doesn't matter how good trash can lock, she will open it! She had a hard time tipping it over but after a couple of weeks she finally did, and trash was all over the place :( Good thing is, even when she pushed it around, it didn't break! not even a scratch. I love that I can get the inner receptacle and wash it as needed instead of getting my whole head in there to scrub it like with the one I had before!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide Secure Opening
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this garbage can opens and how wide the opening is. The lid is totally secure and I know because I have pets that are experts at getting into garbage cans. This can is really well built and it has the design that makes it a pleasure to have in your kitchen. I am so tired of putting up with cheap, make do equipment. When you get something that really lives up to its functional purpose it is like a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Rdal

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I’d love a trash can
customer_reviews.text: Really didn’t want to spend this much on a trash can, but I have to say it’s very much worth it. It is smudge proof so far, love the liner that pulls out, lid closes quietly, step pedal works well. It isn’t the largest capacity trash can I’ve ever had, but more than enough for my two person household. We take the trash out less than every week on average.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek, fits well in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is the most money I've ever spent on a garbage can, but it was worth it. This bin is sleek and feels well made, though I've been handling it gently because I love it so much and don't want to damage it...time will tell if it's durable. It fits perfectly into an awkward corner we have in the kitchen (with little side to side or top clearance). The pedal is sturdy. Smears and fingerprints wipe up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Poupee Folle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd spend this much on a trash can, but glad I did. We love this thing. The only problem is the standard 13-gallon bags fit very tight. I know they do this so they can sell you their bags, but at about 3 times the price of Glad bags, I don't feel they are a good buy. The lid lock up feature is great. It would be nearly impossible to change the bag without that feature. Love the auto-close feature too. No trash can lid banging down. We hope this trash can will last many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Wente

customer_reviews.title: Excellent built product!
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this trash can for three years. Never a malfunction...easy to clean...easy to remove plastic waste bags and insert new ones. I use the Kirkwood (Costco) plastic 30 lb bags and they work flawlessly. I did buy a 3/4 inch rubber band at the local supermarket to go around the top of the bag when in use and that works very well. This thing is built well and looks good in my kitchen, which helps since it won't fit under a sink cabinet. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: John Reggio

customer_reviews.title: Great looking can to hide your trash
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend so much on a trash can—it seems ridiculous, BUT we love it and I wish I would’ve bought one sooner. It’s clean, simple and uses space efficiently. Very few fingerprints from my 3 kids and easy to keep bag tucked neatly inside and replace when necessary. Somehow my kitchen still looks nice with a large trashcan in it! I still think it’s pricey for a place to throw your trash, but it was the best thing out there when I compared the options.
customer_reviews.author: Allie&Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: They said: "Strong Steel Pedal - Engineered to last 150,000 steps; that's more than 20 steps a day for 20 years". Well I didn't step on the pedal more than 20 times a day, probably I averaged 10 times a day. The pedal stopped working just when it hit 6 years old. I know thats not too bad. But it did cost a lot of money and I don't think their claims are true. It isn't that well built. And like others said, the plastic lid cracked awhile ago in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This trash bin has been great. I read some reviews where there were issues with the lid, but I have had no such issues. It works fantastically every time, looks very nice, and is easy to prop lid up and change out bag in bin. A plus was it came with a bag of trash bags that fit it very well, which I thought was nice, and they do work wonderfully. I had to get this because my cats get into open lid trash bins because....cats.... Spending money on a bin to hold trash is always hard for me to do, but I'm very satisfied with this purchase, and it looks good against any kind of decor.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Quality merchandise and service.
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing multiple trashcans I chose this Simplehuman model because of its dimensions and shape. It arrived double boxed in a sturdy carton. The inner box was wrapped in shrink wrap. Upon opening the box, styrofoam at the top and bottom of a plastic wrapped trashcan. Stainless steel lid and body with smooth operating pedal. An inner plastic bin to which the garbage bag is held. The trashcan may be considered pricey by some; however, from an aesthetic perspective alone its worth it. It blends well with the other stainless steel appliances, and is fingerprint proof as well. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wrj, Owings Mills, MD   This is an addendum to an earlier review of my recent purchase of the All-Clad stainless steel kettle.  I've noticed there are several negative comments about this kettle, such as white flecks in the water, to a filmy discoloration on the interior of the kettle.  After daily use, my interior is as shiny as when I first bought it.  One thing though, I use bottled water.  I find that I don't get like scale on my pots, this kettle, my clothes iron or my drip coffeemaker.  I'm thinking that the reported white flecks in poured water could be that scale flaking off the inside surface. Distilled white vinegar can help eliminate limescale buildup.  As for residue on the outside, I remove my kettle from the stove before frying/sauteeing to avoid free radicals from settling on my kettle. Just a thought.

customer_reviews.title: Great product value for money
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this garbage can made my life so much easier, easy to pull the garbage out with the lock feature, really spacious, they sent me garbage bags with it which are sturdy. I had garbage cans before but this one is far more better than any ones I have owned before. This comes with a 10 year warranty . You can register the product with the company with the codes they provided . Nice nice product
customer_reviews.author: Su

customer_reviews.title: Best trashcan if you have dogs who like to get into your trash.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this off Amazon 5 years ago. If you have a baby, or toddler in diapers, and you have dogs who were tall enough to nose the lid open and pull out trash, you need this can. That's the whole reason we ordered this one, because the recessed lid can't be nudged open by dogs. And it worked wonderfully. I didn't realize how old it was. 5 years later, the springs have finally given out and now we need to order a new one. I really wish they weren't 100 bucks tho. Or I wish the springs could be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Random Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: SimpleHuman makes it simple!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time trying to decide on a trash can for my kitchen because, to me, it seems absurd to spend $100+ on something you’re putting your garbage into! With that said, I’m glad I spent a little more on this one vs. another I was looking at because it’s sleek, smudge-proof and goes well with the black and stainless steel appliances I have. The bags they give you are a nice bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Sleak design and large
customer_reviews.text: This is a big trash can. Love the butterfly doors. It is soft close. It takes standard trash bags from supermarket and they fit tight around the edge which is great. Better than the bags from simplehuman themselves. Wish the hold open feature was a little easier to access. You have to reach your hand in the back and pull lever to side.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, large kitchen trash can
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is such a big improvement from the standard one. The inner lining, the stainless steel exterior, the ease of the pedal - it's all very nice and improved my throwing away trash experience quite a lot. However I did mark off a star because of their attempted requirements on forcing you to use their bags, which are way too expensive. You can fit normal trash bags in there, they don't fit perfectly but they work.
customer_reviews.author: AlderGod

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can. Pricey, but seems worth it. The butterfly lid opens up a large space without having a huge lid flip up and into counters or being limited by overhead clearance. It is very big so holds a lot of kitchen waste before needing to be taken out. I had a previous model that I was not as fond of because the opening tabs were made of plastic and eventually both tabs broke making the step pedal ineffective. This new design seems to have addressed that by replacing those tabs with metal ones. Very easy to clean, no fingerprints and looks great standing next to the counter.
customer_reviews.author: coastalrn

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra space
customer_reviews.text: This is my second kitchen can after my first finally gave out after 10+ years of service. I was amazed when I took it out of the box that it was more spacious which meant less bags/more trash to put out at the curb. I chose this over the newer model that has a slot for the trash bag dispenser which I felt took up more interior space. BTW their trash bags are super sturdy and way thicker than any Glad or Hefty bag. A+
customer_reviews.author: lovemy2pooches

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Amazon warehouse since I couldn't bring myself to pay the full retail price for a garbage bin! But I am very happy with it. There is a small barely noticeable cosmetic damage (scratch) to the top, but it was almost half the price, so absolutely worth it. It is noiseless, a nice weight, and has a nice profile. I've purchased several garbage bins over the years, and this is probably the best one I've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: AB123

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and huge dent on back left side!
customer_reviews.author: Lcald

customer_reviews.title: Buy ONE! Best I've seen in over 50 years
customer_reviews.text: It works (very well), it's clean (and easy to clean), it is well designed, it's quiet and absolutely worth the money. You can find other trash bags that'll work, but this is a quality piece of essential equipment. I have zero regrets and I'm hard to please. Great Job! I do wish the trash bags were cheaper but you have plenty of alternatives out there. I looked everywhere and we're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Evagee

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Simplehuman 50 Liter / 13.2 Gallon Rectangular Kitchen Step Trash Can, Brushed Stainless Steel. Step feature and lids closure work very well. Does not readily show smudges. Have only had about a month so cannot speak to longevity. Really like having the internal can to hook the bag to, just in case a bag does happen to leak, much easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MBrett

customer_reviews.title: Here's the thing.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived looking like it was dropped off a building. Or rammed with a pallet truck. Crazy times. I blame no one. Just be warned. Still works. Just looks like it's been happily partaking in an amateur demolition derby.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrob

customer_reviews.title: BEST. TRASHCAN. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: We had a smaller Simple Human Trashcan that fit plastic grocery bags. It died after 13 years, and grocery bags are no longer allowed. This is an upgrade and worth $100. If a trashcan can be beautiful, it is. It is the perfect height and shape. It has a small footprint for the volume it holds. It can use regular 13-gallon bags. It sparks joy every time we use it. Our only regret is that we didn't buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: JYC

customer_reviews.title: Still works perfectly after 6 years
customer_reviews.text: After using this everyday for 6 years in our kitchen, I am happy to report it still works just as well as the first day! We used to buy cans that the mechanisms broke every 6 months. This one is great and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem completely fingerprint/smudge proof, but it is easy to clean. I have 3 other simplehuman trash cans around the house and they are great and they last for awhile as well. We will be using ours for recycling, but we tested it out, and the store bought trash bags we have, fit perfectly inside. This is nice if you don't want to have to pay a lot for the simplehuman trash bags. Overall, 4/5!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Beaton

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this trashcan! I know some people have complained that the trash bags are expensive, but honestly I feel they’re worth it. The code Q bags are the perfect size and fit for the can, and they’re thick. Unfortunately, they’re out of stock right now, so I had to pay $40 through the manufacturer. I’m ok with that though, because 100 bags will last us at least 8 months. I’ve never had anything leak. If you need a trash can, get this one. I wish I got it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this can. The only part that needs cleaning is the foot pedal (occasionally). Im sure I'll need to clean it at some point but it will be a breeze. It's sleek and beautiful, quiet as a mouse. I haven't tried the lock feature. Also, the bags that came with it really do fit perfectly. My last can, which became my last can because it decided to close automatically as I was dropping coffee grounds into it. I can't say enough good stuff about this can, perfect size, good looking, easy to clean. This will be my last trash can purchase. Thanks Simple Human
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be compelled to write a review of a trash can but Simple Human's product is just that good. We got the 38 Liter stainless and it is a definite upgrade from our plastic kitchen can. We love the lock feature for when we are peeling vegetables and love the smoothness of the opening with the pedal. It also came with a free set of trash bags designed to fit which are so excellent we ordered more. I would purchase more Simple Human products!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhh Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is an overpriced trash can and yes I bought it and yes I like it. Not much to complain about. My previous could be opened by hand or with step pedal and I find myself sometimes trying to open this by hand so I'm working through that involuntary urge. The can doesn't have any odor quelling ability and that's the worst feature. If it could seal in odor, it would be a real specimen of a trash can.
customer_reviews.author: honesty

customer_reviews.title: Serious upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Is it strange that I'm excited about a new trashcan? We replaced our cheap ugly plastic kitchen trashcan for this sleek beauty and it has made such a visual difference in our space. I love that we never have to touch the lid when tossing messy kitchen garbage, which means it will say looking great. Delivery was lightening fast and it was very well packaged. My cats are now happily playing in the inner box.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Dent
customer_reviews.text: We received this trashcan in a box that looked like it was previously opened and kicked around like a (giant) ball at soccer practice. The back of the trashcan has a dent in it, likely due to the aforementioned kicking. I generally expect something a lot better when I pay over 100 dollars for a trash can. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C Breck

customer_reviews.title: Lid slams into rear wall - terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: This can is supposedly manufactured so that the lid won't slam into the wall if you place the unit up against one. So much for that promise - the unit I received is slowly but surely chipping away at the paint on my walls. The customer service team at Simple Human has been atrocious - slow to respond and unwilling to provide any kind of repair or satisfaction. I would not have paid this kind of money had I known that the can would be faulty and Simple Human would be so blasé about it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MG

product_meta.title: simplehuman 45 Liter / 11.9 Gallon Butterfly Lid Kitchen Step Trash Can, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Size:45 Liter| Style Name:Butterfly StepThe simplehuman butterfly step can has an innovative butterfly lid design that opens from the center for maximum clearance under low countertops. The slim, space-efficient shape makes the most of tight spaces. The strong steel pedal and patented lid shox technology ensure the can will function smoothly and quietly for years.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 10-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
CODE K CUSTOM FIT LINERS – Enhance your trash experience with extra-strong and durable trash bags that fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience.
STRONG WIDE STEEL PEDAL - Engineered to last 150,000 steps - that's more than 20 steps a day for 20 years.
SILENT CLOSE LID - Patented lid shox technology controls the motion of the lid for a slow, silent, quiet close – no banging or loud noises.
INTERNAL HINGE – Allows you to place this can right up against the wall without scratching.
STAY-OPEN LID - The lid stays open for as long as you like — perfect for longer chores.
FINGERPRINT-PROOF FINISH - Resists smudges to keep stainless steel shiny.
INNOVATIVE BUTTERFLY LID - Innovative split doors open from the center for maximum clearance under low countertops.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,998 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
